entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 29 April 2016
